verse: Then I saw another angel coming down from heaven. This angel had great power. The angel’s glory made the earth bright.
The angel shouted in a powerful voice:
Then I heard another voice from heaven say:
The kings of the earth who sinned sexually with her and shared her wealth will see the smoke from her burning. Then they will cry and weep because of her death.
They will be afraid of her suffering and stand far away. They will say:
And the businessmen of the earth will cry and weep for her. They will be sad because now there is no one to buy the things they sell.

They sell gold, silver, jewels, pearls, fine linen cloth, purple cloth, silk, and red cloth. They sell all kinds of citron wood and all kinds of things made from ivory, expensive wood, bronze, iron, and marble.
They also sell cinnamon, spice, incense, myrrh, frankincense, wine, and olive oil; fine flour, wheat, cattle, sheep, horses, and carriages. They sell the bodies and souls of men.
The businessmen will be afraid of her suffering and stand far away from her. These are the men who became rich from selling those things to her. The men will cry and be sad.
They saw the smoke from her burning. They said loudly, “There was never a city like this great city!”
They threw dust on their heads and cried to show how sad they were. They said:
Then a powerful angel picked up a stone like a large stone for grinding grain. The angel threw the stone into the sea and said:
